0101011111101100 1101110001001010 1 -> sum: 0011010000110111, cout: 1
1101110011101101 0010001001111101 0 -> sum: 1111111101101010, cout: 0

0100110001100000 0100111001010111 1 -> sum: 1001101010111000, cout: 0
1111001101101100 1011000010010010 1 -> sum: 1010001111111111, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
